entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
Hi, I'd like to return a pair of cycling shoes, and also some tires I recently purchased.
Okay, I can definitely look into that for you. To start, what's the order number associated with these items?
Thanks. I see the shoes and tires here. Before we proceed, have either of these items been, say, *mounted* or *installed* on your bike?
Yes, I did *install* the tires and I *mounted* the *cleats* on the shoes and used them for a ride.

I understand. Unfortunately, because the shoes have *cleat marks* and the tires have been *mounted* and used, resulting in *dirty tires*, we are unable to accept a return. Once an item has been used and shows signs of wear, we *cannot resell* it as new. This is part of our return policy to ensure all of our customers receive new, unused products when they order from VeloFit. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
Oh, I see. That makes sense. I guess I should have read the fine print more carefully. I just assumed I could return them if they didn't fit right after a quick test ride.

I understand your frustration. While we can't accept the return in this specific case, perhaps I can offer you a discount code for a future purchase to help offset the cost? It would be valid for 15% off your next order.
That would be great, thank you!
You're welcome! I've applied the discount code 'VF15OFF' to your account. It will automatically apply at checkout on your next order. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thank you for your help!
You're very welcome! Have a great day, and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
